name: Lollipop2 & Marshmallow Match3
description:
Play the sweetest match-3 game ever in a candy wonderland!

Lollipop & Marshmallow Match3 is a sweet and tasty match-3 puzzle game!

One of the best BRAIN TEASERS!
Do you have a BIG sweet tooth? Do you like rainbows galore?
We’ve just the game for you, Lollipop & Marshmallow Match-3!
Help Jenny win back the stolen lollipops from the Marshmallow brothers!

Sweeten up the game as you match assorted lollipops, solving perplexing puzzles!

HOW TO PLAY
• Swap and match 3 or more candies!
• Earn special candies including bees that help you clear the levels!
• Remove as many candies as you can!
• Use powerful boosters to clear obstacles!
• Collect 3 stars to get more coins!

FEATURES
• 3 MATCH PUZZLE
- Savor sweet success as you match colorful candies, with perplexing puzzles to solve.

• TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
- More than 200 levels with regular updates!

• EASY AND FUN TO PLAY
- Simple. Just swap & match!
- Get rid of all the obstacles with various colorful and powerful items.
- Candies don’t just fall from above but also from all other directions!

• NO TIME LIMIT
- Play at your own pace.

• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- Play offline!

NOTES
• Lollipop & Marshmallow Match3 contains ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• Lollipop & Marshmallow Match3 is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and coins.

• SUPPORT UNIVERSAL APP
- Enjoy the game with various devices. (iPhone and iPad)
